title: 2012 NCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship
text:
The 2012 NCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament contested from May 29–June 3 at the <a href="Riviera%20Country%20Club">Riviera Country Club</a> in <a href="Pacific%20Palisades%2C%20California">Pacific Palisades, California</a>. It was the 74th <a href="NCAA%20Division%20I%20Men%27s%20Golf%20Championships">NCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship</a>. The team championship was won by the <a href="Texas%20Longhorns">Texas Longhorns</a> who won their third national championship by defeating the <a href="Alabama%20Crimson%20Tide">Alabama Crimson Tide</a> in the championship <a href="match%20play">match play</a> round 3–2. The individual national championship was won by <a href="Thomas%20Pieters">Thomas Pieters</a> from the <a href="Illinois%20Fighting%20Illini">University of Illinois</a>.
Venue.
This was the first NCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship held at the Riviera Country Club in <a href="Pacific%20Palisades%2C%20California">Pacific Palisades, California</a>.
